Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/List/domain

Synopsis The set of all legal indices of a list.
Function set[int] domain(list[&T] lst)
Description Returns the set of all legal index values for a list. Also see List/index for a function that returns a list of index values.
Examples 
rascal>import List;
ok
rascal>domain([1, 3, 5]);
set[int]: {2,1,0}
